verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> become כְּהָכִ֞ין <WH3559> had established מַלְכ֤וּת <WH4438> the kingdom רְחַבְעָם֙ <WH7346> And it came to pass when Rehoboam וּכְחֶזְקָת֔וֹ <WH2393> and had strengthened עָזַ֖ב <WH5800> himself he forsook אֶת־ <WH853> תּוֹרַ֣ת <WH8451> the law יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> and all Israel עִמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5973> with פ

וַיְהִ֞י <WH1961> came בַּשָּׁנָ֤ה <WH8141> year הַֽחֲמִישִׁית֙ <WH2549> And it came to pass [that] in the fifth לַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> of king רְחַבְעָ֔ם <WH7346> Rehoboam עָלָ֛ה <WH5927> came up שִׁישַׁ֥ק <WH7895> Shishak מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> of Egypt עַל־ <WH5921> against יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> against Jerusalem כִּ֥י <WH3588> because מָעֲל֖וּ <WH4603> because they had transgressed בַּיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> against the LORD

בְּאֶ֤לֶף <WH505> thousand וּמָאתַ֙יִם֙ <WH3967> hundred רֶ֔כֶב <WH7393> chariots וּבְשִׁשִּׁ֥ים <WH8346> and threescore אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand פָּרָשִׁ֑ים <WH6571> horsemen וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> were without מִסְפָּ֗ר <WH4557> [were] without number לָעָ֞ם <WH5971> and the people אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who בָּ֤אוּ <WH935> that came עִמּוֹ֙ <WH5973> from מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> with him out of Egypt לוּבִ֥ים <WH3864> the Lubims סֻכִּיִּ֖ים <WH5525> the Sukkiims וְכוּשִֽׁים׃ <WH3569> and the Ethiopians

וַיִּלְכֹּ֛ד <WH3920> And he took אֶת־ <WH853> עָרֵ֥י <WH5892> cities הַמְּצֻר֖וֹת <WH4694> the fenced אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after לִֽיהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> which [pertained] to Judah וַיָּבֹ֖א <WH935> and came עַד־ <WH5704> far יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> to Jerusalem ס

וּֽשְׁמַֽעְיָ֤ה <WH8098> Shemaiah הַנָּבִיא֙ <WH5030> the prophet בָּ֣א <WH935> Then came אֶל־ <WH413> to רְחַבְעָ֔ם <WH7346> to Rehoboam וְשָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> and [to] the princes יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who נֶאֶסְפ֥וּ <WH622> that were gathered together אֶל־ <WH413> at יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> to Jerusalem מִפְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> because שִׁישָׁ֑ק <WH7895> of Shishak וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> and said לָהֶ֜ם כֹּה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> unto them Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD אַתֶּם֙ <WH859> You עֲזַבְתֶּ֣ם <WH5800> Ye have forsaken אֹתִ֔י <WH853> וְאַף־ <WH637> me and therefore have I also אֲנִ֛י <WH589> I עָזַ֥בְתִּי <WH5800> left אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> בְּיַד־ <WH3027> you in the hand שִׁישָֽׁק׃ <WH7895> of Shishak

וַיִּכָּנְע֥וּ <WH3665> humbled שָׂרֵֽי־ <WH8269> Whereupon the princes יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel וְהַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> and the king וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <WH559> themselves and they said צַדִּ֥יק ׀ <WH6662> [is] righteous יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> The LORD

וּבִרְא֤וֹת <WH7200> saw יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And when the LORD כִּ֣י <WH3588> for נִכְנָ֔עוּ <WH3665> that they humbled הָיָה֩ <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> themselves the word יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to שְׁמַֽעְיָ֧ה ׀ <WH8098> came to Shemaiah לֵאמֹ֛ר <WH559> saying נִכְנְע֖וּ <WH3665> They have humbled לֹ֣א <WH3808> not אַשְׁחִיתֵ֑ם <WH7843> themselves [therefore] I will not destroy וְנָתַתִּ֨י <WH5414> them but I will grant לָהֶ֤ם <WH1992> them כִּמְעַט֙ <WH4592> them some לִפְלֵיטָ֔ה <WH6413> deliverance וְלֹא־ <WH3808> not תִתַּ֧ךְ <WH5413> shall not be poured out חֲמָתִ֛י <WH2534> and my wrath בִּירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> upon Jerusalem בְּיַד־ <WH3027> by the hand שִׁישָֽׁק׃ <WH7895> of Shishak

כִּ֥י <WH3588> for יִהְיוּ־ <WH1961> will become ל֖וֹ לַעֲבָדִ֑ים <WH5650> Nevertheless they shall be his servants וְיֵדְעוּ֙ <WH3045> that they may know עֲב֣וֹדָתִ֔י <WH5656> my service וַעֲבוֹדַ֖ת <WH5656> and the service מַמְלְכ֥וֹת <WH4467> of the kingdoms הָאֲרָצֽוֹת׃ <WH776> of the countries ס

וַיַּ֨עַל <WH5927> came up שִׁישַׁ֥ק <WH7895> So Shishak מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king מִצְרַיִם֮ <WH4714> of Egypt עַל־ <WH5921> against יְרוּשָׁלִַם֒ <WH3389> against Jerusalem וַיִּקַּ֞ח <WH3947> and took away אֶת־ <WH853> אֹצְר֣וֹת <WH214> the treasures בֵּית־ <WH1004> of the house יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֹֽצְרוֹת֙ <WH214> and the treasures בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king's אֶת־ <WH853> הַכֹּ֖ל <WH3605> everything לָקָ֑ח <WH3947> he took וַיִּקַּח֙ <WH3947> all he carried away אֶת־ <WH853> מָגִנֵּ֣י <WH4043> also the shields הַזָּהָ֔ב <WH2091> of gold אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> had made שְׁלֹמֹֽה׃ <WH8010> which Solomon

וַיַּ֨עַשׂ <WH6213> made הַמֶּ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> Instead of which king רְחַבְעָם֙ <WH7346> Rehoboam תַּחְתֵּיהֶ֔ם <WH8478> their place מָגִנֵּ֖י <WH4043> shields נְחֹ֑שֶׁת <WH5178> of brass וְהִפְקִ֗יד <WH6485> and committed עַל־ <WH5921> and יַד֙ <WH3027> [them] to the hands שָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> of the chief הָרָצִ֔ים <WH7323> of the guard הַשֹּׁ֣מְרִ֔ים <WH8104> that kept פֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> the entrance בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> house הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> of the king's

וַיְהִ֛י <WH1961> become מִדֵּי־ <WH1767> And when ב֥וֹא <WH935> entered הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> the king בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> into the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD בָּ֤אוּ <WH935> came הָרָצִים֙ <WH7323> the guard וּנְשָׂא֔וּם <WH5375> and fetched וֶהֱשִׁב֖וּם <WH7725> them and brought them again אֶל־ <WH413> about תָּ֥א <WH8372> chamber הָרָצִֽים׃ <WH7323> into the guard

וּבְהִכָּֽנְע֗וֹ <WH3665> And when he humbled שָׁ֤ב <WH7725> turned מִמֶּ֙נּוּ֙ <WH4480> at אַף־ <WH639> himself the wrath יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not לְהַשְׁחִ֖ית <WH7843> from him that he would not destroy לְכָלָ֑ה <WH3617> [him] altogether וְגַם֙ <WH1571> and also בִּֽיהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> and also in Judah הָיָ֖ה <WH1961> become דְּבָרִ֥ים <WH1697> things טוֹבִֽים׃ <WH2896> went well ס

וַיִּתְחַזֵּ֞ק <WH2388> strengthened הַמֶּ֧לֶךְ <WH4428> So king רְחַבְעָ֛ם <WH7346> Rehoboam בִּירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> himself in Jerusalem וַיִּמְלֹ֑ךְ <WH4427> and reigned כִּ֣י <WH3588> Now בֶן־ <WH1121> old אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <WH705> and forty וְאַחַ֣ת <WH259> [was] one שָׁנָה֩ <WH8141> years רְחַבְעָ֨ם <WH7346> for Rehoboam בְּמָלְכ֜וֹ <WH4427> when he began to reign וּֽשֲׁבַ֨ע <WH7651> seven עֶשְׂרֵ֥ה <WH6240> teen שָׁנָ֣ה ׀ <WH8141> years מָלַ֣ךְ <WH4427> and he reigned בִּֽירוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <WH3389> in Jerusalem הָ֠עִיר <WH5892> the city אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which בָּחַ֨ר <WH977> had chosen יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> which the LORD לָשׂ֨וּם <WH7760> to put אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמ֥וֹ <WH8034> his name שָׁם֙ <WH8033> there מִכֹּל֙ <WH3605> all שִׁבְטֵ֣י <WH7626> out of all the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וְשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> name אִמּ֔וֹ <WH517> there And his mother's נַעֲמָ֖ה <WH5279> [was] Naamah הָֽעַמֹּנִֽית׃ <WH5985> an Ammonitess

וַיַּ֖עַשׂ <WH6213> And he did הָרָ֑ע <WH7451> evil כִּ֣י <WH3588> because לֹ֤א <WH3808> did not הֵכִין֙ <WH3559> because he prepared לִבּ֔וֹ <WH3820> not his heart לִדְר֖וֹשׁ <WH1875> to seek אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD ס

וְדִבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> Now the acts רְחַבְעָ֗ם <WH7346> of Rehoboam הָרִאשֹׁנִים֙ <WH7223> first וְהָאֲ֣חַרוֹנִ֔ים <WH314> and last הֲלֹא־ <WH3808> not הֵ֨ם <WH1992> like כְּתוּבִ֜ים <WH3789> [are] they not written בְּדִבְרֵ֨י <WH1697> in the book שְׁמַֽעְיָ֧ה <WH8098> of Shemaiah הַנָּבִ֛יא <WH5030> the prophet וְעִדּ֥וֹ <WH5714> and of Iddo הַחֹזֶ֖ה <WH2374> the seer לְהִתְיַחֵ֑שׂ <WH3187> concerning genealogies וּמִלְחֲמ֧וֹת <WH4421> ? And [there were] wars רְחַבְעָ֛ם <WH7346> between Rehoboam וְיָרָבְעָ֖ם <WH3379> and Jeroboam כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner הַיָּמִֽים׃ <WH3117> continually

וַיִּשְׁכַּ֤ב <WH7901> slept רְחַבְעָם֙ <WH7346> And Rehoboam עִם־ <WH5973> with אֲבֹתָ֔יו <WH1> with his fathers וַיִּקָּבֵ֖ר <WH6912> and was buried בְּעִ֣יר <WH5892> in the city דָּוִ֑יד <WH1732> of David וַיִּמְלֹ֛ךְ <WH4427> reigned אֲבִיָּ֥ה <WH29> and Abijah בְנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <WH8478> his place פ
